imageAssets.logoFormat: SVG or PNG with transparent background

voiceAndTone.description: Conversational yet authoritative. Motivational without being preachy. Use relatable language that resonates with ambitious Pakistani students.
examples: DO: 'Master MDCAT with proven strategies from top scorers.'
DON'T: 'You will definitely get 200/200 if you join us!'
DO: 'Join 5,000+ students who trust GWG for their medical dreams.'
DON'T: 'We are the best MDCAT platform in Pakistan.'

writingStyle.sentenceLength: Keep sentences under 20 words for clarity
writingStyle.activeVoice: Always use active voice over passive
writingStyle.avoidJargon: Explain technical terms when first introduced
writingStyle.culturalContext: Use Pakistani educational context (KEMU, Dow, NUMS, etc.)

accessibilityRequirements.colorContrast: Minimum 4.5:1 ratio for text on backgrounds
accessibilityRequirements.focusStates: All interactive elements must have visible focus indicators
accessibilityRequirements.altText: All images must have descriptive alt text
accessibilityRequirements.screenReaderSupport: Semantic HTML and ARIA labels where needed

performanceOptimization.imageOptimization: Use next/image or similar for lazy loading and optimization
performanceOptimization.codeSpltting: Lazy load components below the fold
performanceOptimization.fontLoading: Use font-display: swap for web fonts
performanceOptimization.cssOptimization: Use Tailwind's purge feature to remove unused styles

aboutText.text: Grow With Gurus is Pakistan's leading MDCAT preparation and scholarship guidance platform. We combine expert teaching, proven strategies, and real-world insights to help ambitious students secure their place in top medical schools — both in Pakistan and abroad. Our mission is simple: create opportunities, unlock potential, and shape the future of Pakistan's medical professionals.

subheading.text: Explore the success stories of students who achieved their MDCAT dreams and secured scholarships abroad with GWG.

cards.text: GWG helped me score 189/200 in MDCAT! The study material and mock tests were exactly like the real exam. I got into King Edward Medical University!
cards.style: bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-900 to-black border border-orange-500/20 p-6 rounded-xl hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-all

cards.text: I never thought I could study abroad, but GWG's scholarship team guided me through every step. Now I'm on a full scholarship in Germany!

cards.text: The live doubt sessions saved me! I was struggling with organic chemistry, but the mentors explained everything so clearly. Highly recommend!

cards.text: Best decision ever! GWG's bootcamp taught me time management strategies that boosted my score by 30 marks. Worth every rupee.

paragraphs.text: Grow With Gurus is Pakistan's most trusted learning platform for MDCAT preparation and international scholarship guidance. We combine expert teaching, proven test-taking strategies, and real-world career insights to help ambitious students achieve their medical dreams.

Our mission is simple: create opportunities, unlock potential, and shape the future of Pakistan's healthcare professionals. Whether you're targeting top medical colleges in Pakistan or seeking fully-funded scholarships abroad, we provide the expert guidance and comprehensive resources you need to succeed.

description.text: Find quick answers to common questions about MDCAT preparation, scholarships, and our learning resources.

items.question: How do I access the study materials after enrolling?
items.answer: Once you enroll in any resource, you'll get instant access to all materials through your student dashboard. You can watch videos, download notes, and take practice tests anytime.
items.style: bg-gray-900 border border-orange-500/20 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-all cursor-pointer

items.question: Are the mock tests similar to the actual MDCAT exam?
items.answer: Yes! Our mock tests are designed by MDCAT toppers and experienced instructors. They mirror the actual exam pattern, difficulty level, and time constraints to give you realistic practice.
items.style: bg-gray-900 border border-orange-500/20 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-all cursor-pointer

items.question: Do you offer refunds if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not happy with the resource quality within the first week, contact our support team for a full refund.
items.style: bg-gray-900 border border-orange-500/20 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-all cursor-pointer

items.question: Can I get personalized guidance for scholarship applications?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our scholarship guidance package includes one-on-one mentorship, SOP reviews, and interview preparation tailored to your target universities and programs.
items.style: bg-gray-900 border border-orange-500/20 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-all cursor-pointer
